DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total number of HLA antigens provided.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles._Any substance, generally a protein, that stimulates the immune system and elicits an immune response. Recognition by the immune system elicits either a T-lymphocyte response, recognizing processed antigens, or a B-lymphocyte response, producing antibodies that bind to unprocessed antigens.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Concepts.definition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any substance that appears foreign or potentially adverse to the body and elicits immune response.

Concepts.definition: Any substance, generally a protein, that stimulates the immune system and elicits an immune response.  Recognition by the immune system elicits either a T-lymphocyte response, recognizing processed antigens, or a B-lymphocyte response, producing antibodies that bind to unprocessed antigens.

ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the HLA typing antigen count?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG Mapping for CDE 3811041
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedClinicalResult.value(ANY=>INT) WHERE PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "count HLA-A Gene Serological Antigen" AND PerformedClinicalResult.targetBiomarkerCode = 'HLA-A Antigen'

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG Mapping for CDE:3811041
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedClinicalResult.value(ANY=>INT) WHERE PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "count HLA-B Gene Serological Antigen" AND PerformedClinicalResult.targetBiomarkerCode = 'HLA-B Antigen'

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG Mapping for CDE: 3811041
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedClinicalResult.value(ANY=>CD) WHERE PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "count HLA-C Gene Serological Antigen" AND PerformedClinicalResult.targetBiomarkerCode = 'HLA-C Antigen'
